about_the_game:
Welcome to Paris!

Your visit wouldn't be complete without a visit to the historical sites of the Louvre, Notre Dame and Palace of Versailles. 

In this DLC, you will find three levels with a total of 300 new hidden cats, each showcasing the aforementioned places in great detail. 

Louvre

Originally a medieval castle, the Louvre is now the largest art museum in the world. It features works such as the Mona Lisa and the Venus de Milo. The museum’s beautiful glass pyramid entrance blends present-day architecture with rich historical heritage.

Notre Dame

Notre Dame Cathedral is a masterpiece of French Gothic architecture, known for its dramatic facades, stained glass windows and mythical gargoyles. Despite a fire in 2019, restoration efforts continue to preserve its greatness for future generations.

Palace of Versailles

The Palace of Versailles symbolises royal opulence with its stunning Hall of Glass and vast formal gardens. Once the residence of Louis XIV, it showcases high-quality 17th-century French art and architecture.

name: Cats Hidden in Paris - Historical Sites
short_description: Experience more French culture in three new levels showcasing the Louvre, Notre Dame and the Palace of Versailles in great detail with 300 new hidden cats!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America
